entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:39 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:39 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
